text: Countess Athena of Monpezat, formerly Princess Athena of Denmark (born 24 January 2012) is a member of the Danish royal family. She is the youngest child and only daughter of Prince Joachim and Princess Marie of Denmark. Athena is currently tenth in the line of succession to the Danish throne. == Titles == 24 January 2012-1 January 2023: Her Highness Princess Athena of Denmark, Countess of Monpezat 1 January 2023 -present: Her Excellency Countess Athena of Monpezat ==Ancestry== ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website |- |- Category:People from Copenhagen Category:2012 births Category:Living people Category:Danish royalty Category:Princes and princesses
title: Countess Athena of Monpezat
